title: Bruce Bruce
description:
In this episode Kevin sits down with legendary comedian Bruce Bruce.  Kevin and Bruce discussed the importance of Atlanta’s Club 559, why Bruce wants to put out his own cookbook, and how he got the job of hosting BET’s ComicView.

Like Comedy Gold Minds? SiriusXM subscribers get it a day early, plus Kevin Hart’s Laugh Out Loud Radio, his 24/7 comedy channel, with great talk shows and stand-up. Learn more / check it out for 3 months at siriusxm.com/comedygoldminds
author: podcasts@siriusxm.com (SiriusXM)
